monitor.description: related to startups and data science in Belgium

appText.title: twitto.be
appText.subtitle: Real time dashboard of Belgian startup tweets
appText.about: Twitto.be is a live dashboard providing analytics about the tweets related to entrepreneurship in Belgium. The data you're seeing is what is happening right now on twitter, it's real real-time.
appText.cta:
Need your own dashboard?

Let us help you make sense of business data.

We design business-centric solutions using analytics and modern web visualizations.

Hire us!

appMeta.title: Twitto.be - realtime hashtags network graph analytics - SNA
appMeta.description: Twitto is a live analytics dashboard of the tweets related to entrepreneurship in Belgium. Curious about the trending topics right now? Come have a look.
